note:
I'm a doctoral student in theology who also does Bible and ethics, and a Chicagoan and left-Lutheran in pursuit of more faithful and just religion.

Currently dissertating on Karl Barth's Christology, always opposed to both neotraditionalism and fundamentalism, and trying to strip our imposed Christianity off the New Testament so we can see it for what it is.

I read and watch a lot of sci-fi, and I'm running left there, too.

Bi/pan, he/him, muddling along with adult ADHD and anxiety
